column4: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col.4)
column5: Cases Sent for Trial during the year (Col.5)
column10: Cases Disposed off by Plea Bargaining (Col.10)
column13: Cases Stayed or Sent to Record Room (Col.13)
column14: Cases Convicted Out of Cases from Previous Year (Col.14)
column15: Cases Convicted Out of Cases during the Year (Col.15)
column19: Cases in which Trials were Completed (Col.19=Col.16+Col.17+ Col.18)
column21: Cases Pending Trial at End of the Year (Col.21=Col.6 - Col.20)
